formattedAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 161 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text:
Very skilled Dr. Knows what he’s doing. We came to see him as a third opinion on my child wrist fracture. First Dr rushed us to do a surgery. 2nd Dr based on the X-ray and CT scan, wasn’t sure if it was fully fracture, and that’s why she recommended us to do an MRI and go and see Doctor Strauch as a third option. We couldn’t see dr Strauch right away as a new patient, and it took long time until finally we met him. On the day we’ve visited my son took another X-ray and another CT, and apparently the results came out that the fracture started healing itself (50%), and no need for surgery!!!
Massage for life: never rush for things, always ask 2nd and 3rd opinion before making big medical decision. And if things are taking a long time, so there are a reason for it. In our case the reason was a healing time for the fracture!

originalText.text:
Dr. Strauch operated on my broken wrist. He was very professional and very responsive to my questions and concerns. . I had  minimal pain after my surgery and since I had a hiking trip planned, he ensured my wrist was doubly protected with an extra strong cast.
I would highly recommend Dr. Strauch to anyone with hand or wrist problems!!

originalText.text: Dr. Strauch provided me with the best orthopedic care possible. His surgical skills and caring demeanor got me through a very difficult time after I broke my elbow. I have complete faith in him and am grateful for the on-going care that I receive from him.

text.text: Dr. Strauch provided me with the best orthopedic care possible. His surgical skills and caring demeanor got me through a very difficult time after I broke my elbow. I have complete faith in him and am grateful for the on-going care that I receive from him.

originalText.text:
I came to Dr. Robert Strauch with my right wrist fracture. I was worry that I couldn't  get my hand back. I was in panic to have surgery or don't. Thanks a lot to Dr. Strauch, he is professional and knowledgeable doctor, he did a good job. I am so glad, I fully got my hand back with not surgery.
I highly recommend this doctor.
Tanya Litochevsky

originalText.text: I just had my trigger finger release with Dr. Strauch! I am so thankful I found such a great Doctor that would take time to actually figure our or assess where the problem was. I would highly recommend him for orthopedic issues. Very professional, highly skilled and most importantly he listens to his patient.
